long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An efficient tool for parsing jobs and resumes from LinkedIn integrated with ExcelHire

Recruiters and HR professionals can parse resumes directly from emails to meet the needs of the job description

This extension is very easy to use:

1) Install the plugin
2) Login to excelhire plugin
3) Click Email Parsing button
4) Enable Gmail and Outlook parsing button
5) Authenticate your outlook when logging in for the first time
